Comments_List: Really enjoyed the material in the course- there's no other like it. I hope this continues on! However, this semester the switch from lecture to seminar weighed heavily on the students. The seminar section of the course was very unorganized and hard to keep up with.

This was a great course. The readings and lectures are all very interesting, and the trips to the Beinecke and the CTL's VR lab made a nice complement to the material. I really appreciated the opportunity to explore alterity in medieval literature, which is often much more nuanced than one might expect.
